I have bought it from Moral in Patna. From Moral, right? Yes. I have bought it recently. I have burnt it twice. It is not getting completely burnt. Sometimes, it gets burnt. We have burnt two cups. What? Do you know the email address in detail, sir? No. It is written as ShivaKumar.com. No, sir. It is written as Gmail.com. I will ask you some other details. summary: The customer has bought a packet of Sambarani cups and is experiencing problems with them not burning properly. They are speaking with a customer service agent from ITC in Malayalam and are looking to file a complaint. The agent asks for the customer's details, including their full name, mobile number, and any other available contact information. The agent also asks the customer to check for any manufacturing details on the packet, such as a batch number, manufacturing date, or MRP. The customer reports that there is no batch number but provides the agent with the other information requested. The agent then asks the customer to share photos of the front and back of the packet via WhatsApp and also to provide their address. The customer provides their address and the agent proceeds to file the complaint. The agent promises to raise the complaint and offer a resolution at the earliest.
cohere_points:
- A customer has called an ITC customer service centre to register a complaint about their product not burning properly
- The customer wants to know what they need to do to resolve the issue and if they will get a refund
- The customer service agent is trying to get further information about the product to share with the complaint team. 
- The customer needs to provide their contact information and details about the product to the agent. 
- The customer is then put on hold so that the agent can file the complaint on their behalf. 
- The key details needed to file the complaint is the address, contact number, name and description of the issue. 
- The call ends with the customer being informed that their complaint has been registered and will be dealt with shortly. In essence, the customer is assisted with a complaint they have raised about a product they bought and is then assured that the issue will be resolved soon.
Topic:
1. Customer complaint about product
2. Sambarani cups issue
3. Request for details
4. Manufacturing information
5. Batch number inquiry
6. Customer contact details
7. Request for photos
8. Sealed packet confirmation
9. Address details provided
10. Holding call for complaint
Resolution: The customer's issue is not fully resolved yet as the batch number needed for filing a complaint was not found on the product.
Did the caller Displayed Empathy: Yes, the caller displayed empathy in sentences like "I understand, sir," "If there is any problem like this, I will raise a complaint, sir," and "If there is no batch number, I will file a complaint."
